title: Update forbiddenapis to 2.5 (and Gradle to 2.4.15)
description: Forbiddenapis 2.5 was released today. It also adds support for commons-io v2.6, so it might be also of interest for Solr. The main change is support for Java 10.

comments.content: This update will also use latest 2.4.15 Gradle version, released 2 days ago.
